name: Naruto Shippuden: Ninja Destiny 2
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Time to Fight!



NARUTO Shippuden: Ninja Destiny 2 is the latest installment to the popular 3D pocket fighting series, Ninja Destiny. Exclusively on the Nintendo DS, NARUTO Shippuden: Ninja Destiny 2 features 34 playable characters, all new attacks and cinematic jutsu moves, reworked Story Mode, new Quest Mode and wireless multiplayer battles. Ninja Destiny 2 puts the emphasis on action as players battle in head to head matches with Naruto and his friends.

Features

• The next title in the hit Ninja Destiny 3D fighting series, going further in the NARUTO Shippuden storyline than any other Naruto game• 34 playable characters, from both classic and Shippuden Naruto story arcs, each with upgraded 3D character models and unique special abilities• Featuring enhanced 3D graphics creating a visually impressive “pocket fighter” for the Nintendo DS• Alongside the all-new Story mode, Versus mode and Wireless mode, Ninja Destiny 2 also features an all-new Quest mode, with a multitude of unlockable content• Wireless multiplayer gameplay functionality for up to 2-players• Including enhanced fighting gameplay mechanics for all aspiring ninjas
